Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_ASND_OBJ_PRM_INS_ID_SP" ( P_PRINCIPAL_TYPE IN VARCHAR2, P_PRINCIPAL_ID IN NUMBER, P_OBJECT_ID IN NUMBER, P_PERMISSION_ID IN NUMBER, P_OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID IN NUMBER, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1, P_ID OUT NUMBER ) IS BEGIN SELECT CMN_SEC_ASSGND_OBJ_PERM_S1.NEXTVAL INTO P_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_ASSGND_OBJ_PERM ( ID, PRINCIPAL_TYPE, PRINCIPAL_ID, OBJECT_ID, OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, PERMISSION_ID, RIGHT_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( P_ID, P_PRINCIPAL_TYPE, P_PRINCIPAL_ID, P_OBJECT_ID, P_OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, P_PERMISSION_ID, NULL, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY ); END;
